review: Works very well. Make sure that you select a 1ghz or less speed for you internet connection. Won't operate on 5ghz. Other than that the first one is a 20 minute learning curve. After that any others only take 5-10 minutes. I purchased several for home and office and gave a few as gifts. Easier to operate than smart tv or bluray player and easier to steam ESPN without hooking up a laptop for those non-televised games.
